TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UsableDuringInitializationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UsableDuringInitializationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UsableDuringInitializationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示在 XAML 对象图创建期间是否自上而下生成此类型。

span.span: Indicates whether this type is built top-down during XAML object graph creation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从上到下是在创建对象图时, 与 XAML 处理器行为接近的比喻。Top-down is a metaphor that approximates XAML processor behavior when creating the object graph. 当自上而下生成时, 会实例化类, 并将其附加到父, 然后设置其属性。When built top-down, a class is instantiated, attached to the parent, and then has its properties set. 自上而下的构造避免多次调用属性更改的处理程序。Top-down construction avoids invoking property-changed handlers multiple times. 此类处理会使对象图出现在一起, 从而消除了多个处理程序调用为对象图的启动提供了性能优化。Such handling will ripple up the object graph and therefore eliminating the multiple handler calls provides a performance optimization for startup of the object graph. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中, 此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中 , 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 在[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] 和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]的 WPF XAML 中, 自顶向下构造内置于特定类的 XAML 处理中。In WPF XAML for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], top-down construction was built in to the XAML processing for certain classes. 属性将中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]自上而下行为的报告正规化。 The attribute formalizes the reporting of the top-down behavior in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: usable
param.span: 定义关联的类在初始化期间是否可用。

span.span: Defines whether the associated class is usable during initialization.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性继承。This attribute inherits. 对于初始应用程序, 通常会将应用`[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`为, 但可以在派生`[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]`类上进行设置, 以更改该行为的派生类报告。For the initial application you would typically apply as `[UsableDuringInitialization(true)]`, but you could then set `[UsableDuringInitialization(false)]` on a derived class to change the derived class reporting of the behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Usable As Boolean
public: property bool Usable { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated class is usable during initialization.

value.span: 如果关联类在初始化期间可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the associated class is usable during initialization; otherwise, .
